# Welcome {-}

<a href="https://bioconductor.org"><img src="`r rebook::BiocSticker('animated')`" width="200" alt="Bioconductor Sticker" align="right" style="margin: 0 1em 0 1em" /></a> 

This site contains the basic analysis chapters for the `r BiocStyle::Biocbook("OSCA", label='__"Orchestrating Single-Cell Analysis with Bioconductor"__ book')`.
It describes the early steps of a typical single-cell RNA-seq analysis, ranging from quality control,
normalization, various forms of dimensionality reduction, clustering and detection of marker genes.
